numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that every sport except baseball has at least 50% players of color.
2. Basketball has the highest percentage of players of color.
3. The percentage of players of color in basketball is 83% for men.
4. The percentage of players of color in basketball is 83% for women.
5. Soccer has the highest percentage of coaches of color.
6. The percentage of coaches of color in soccer is 41%.
7. I wonder why men's basketball has the highest percentage of players of color.
8. I wonder why women's basketball has the highest percentage of players of color.
9. I wonder why basketball has a higher percentage of players of color than other sports.
10. Basketball has an influence on people of color.
11. I wonder whether this influence explains the high percentage of players of color in basketball.
12. I wonder whether other reasons explain the high percentage of players of color in basketball.
13. Football has a low percentage of coaches of color.
14. The percentage of coaches of color in football is 13%.
15. Football has the second largest percentage of players of color.
16. The percentage of players of color in football is 74%.
17. I wonder why football has a low percentage of coaches of color despite the high percentage of players of color in football.
18. These numbers impact me in a largely positive way.
19. These numbers impact my community in a largely positive way.
20. These numbers show that many sports players are diverse in major sports.
21. The coaching positions are not as diverse as the playing positions.
22. This situation could be concerning.
23. No listed sport has more than 50% coaches of color.
24. The headline is: Shocking statistics reveal major discrepancies in diversity between playing positions and coaching positions.
